name: tower of potion
description:
HI 

i am a new game developer and this is my first game ever i hope you like it 

it is an endless runner  you have to   MERGE   between potion for you to  create element that destroy   the platform  

it is not totally finished i was going to ad pick up and obstacle but time run out for me i know i can not give more of my time to this jam i have to work in my day job

i use the construct  3 engine to create the game  and aseprite to  create pixelart
